articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Factory and Scientific Institution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Factory and Scientific Institution
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Hamhung Semiconductor Materials Factory and the Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Hamhung Semiconductor Materials Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before a huge map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il went round production processes and products. He warmly encouraged the workers there in their dynamic 150-day campaign and acquainted himself in detail with the technical equipment and production at the factory.
					
					 He highly estimated the feats performed by the workers of the factory, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they laid solid material and technical foundations of the factory by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and are mass- producing quality semiconductor materials.
					
					 He advanced tasks to be fulfilled by the factory. Underscoring the need to steadily boost the production capacity in order to satisfactorily meet the daily growing demand for semiconductor materials, he set a long-term production goal and indicated the orientation and ways for hitting it.
					
					 Then he examined the products turned out at the Rare-Earth Metal Factory and discussed the issue related to the production with officials of the factory before stressing the need to accelerate the technical updating of the factory so as to increase the production of rare-earth metals.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 He, to begin with, went round the exhibits on display at the Exhibition of Scientific Achievements for hours. He was satisfied with a lot of work the group of researchers of the branch have done by working hard for the prosperity and development of the country with all their wisdom and skills.
					
					 Then he learned in detail about the scientific researches at the branch, going round its different places.
					
					 Noting that the branch has made a great contribution to the development of the nation's Juche-based chemical industry including the establishment of the vinalon industry, he highly appreciated the feats performed by it for the party and the revolution, the country and the people over the past years. 
					
					 He advanced highly important tasks facing the branch, saying that the party has a very great expectation towards the branch.
					
					 Our science and technology can serve as a powerful engine for the revolution and construction and provide a scientific and technological guarantee for building a great prosperous and powerful nation only when they are closely combined with production, he said, underlining the need for the scientists and technicians to pay primary attention to the scientific researches relying on the domestic resources. 
					
					 Urging the scientists and technicians to choose, study and settle the scientific and technological issues whose solution is required by the realities, he stressed that to this end they should establish the revolutionary habit of keeping abreast of the pulsating reality and solving scientific and technological problems arising in different fields of the national economy and introduce their research achievements to production in good time by relying on the strength of the popular masses so that they may pay off.
					
					 He called upon the scientists and technicians to advance a lot of scientific hypotheses helpful to the guidance to the implementation of the Party economic policies and specified tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 Our scientists and technicians are the nation's precious persons of talent strong in the revolutionary spirit, he said, underlining the need to take meticulous care of their work and living.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that the scientists and technicians of the Hamhung Branch would bring about a fresh turn in their scientific researches and register valuable research results through the on-going dynamic 150-day campaign.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang, first vice department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Burundi
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Burundi
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on June 27 sent a message of greetings to Pierre Nkurunziza, President of Burundi, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Burundi would grow stronger in the future and wished the President success in his work for the peace of the country and its socio-economic development.

articles.title: Greetings to Ordinary Session of Assembly of Heads of State and Government of AU
articles.content:
Greetings to Ordinary Session of Assembly of Heads of State and Government of AU
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to the 13th Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the AU to be held in Libya. 
					 Kim in the message noted that the AU recently made significant proposals to achieve the regional peace, integration and socio-economic development and boost the unity and cooperation among its member nations and is making positive efforts to this end, adding that this has aroused unanimous support of developing countries. 
					
					 The DPRK government and people have always expressed firm solidarity with the cause of the African peoples for building an independent and prosperous continent in the past and will make invariable efforts to strengthen and develop full of vigor the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member nations in all the fields in the future, too. 
					
					 Expressing the belief that the session would mark an important occasion in providing measures for ensuring the agricultural investment and food security in Africa and strengthening the organization, Kim wished the session success in line with the idea of the AU and common interests of the member nations.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Laos Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Laos Diplomatic Ties Marked
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a reception were arranged in Vientiane on June 24 to mark the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Laos.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photographs of President Kim Il Sung meeting with Lao leaders, works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, pictures showing their immortal feats, books and pictures introducing Songun Korea and Korean handicraft works.
					
					 Present at the events were leading officials of the party, government, ministries, national institutions, the army and public organizations and people from different walks of life in Laos.
					
					 Hiem Phommachanh, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Laos, said at the meeting that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have steadily developed in various fields over the past years.
					
					 Stressing that the fraternal Korean people have achieved signal successes in defending the country and building socialism under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he affirmed that the Lao people would further consolidate the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: Delegate of British Group for Study of Juche Idea Arrives
articles.content:
Delegate of British Group for Study of Juche Idea Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Shawn Pikford, delegate of a British group for the study of the Juche idea, arrived here by air on Tuesday.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Chinese Friendly Delegation Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Chinese Friendly Delegation Held 
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with the members of the friendly delegation of Jilin Yuwen Middle School of China was held at Changdok School on June 30.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the Chinese friendly delegation led by Secretary of Party Committee Wang Yong.
					
					 Teachers and students of Changdok School were on hand.
					
					 The Chinese guests laid a floral basket and bowed before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school. 
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President witnessed the miserable reality of the country and grasped the truth of revolution while studying at the school they looked round the historic relics with keen interest before going round various educational facilities at the school.
					
					 The attendants talked each other about boosting the relations between the two schools and appreciated an art performance given by students.

articles.title: National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The 35th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize was closed with due ceremony in Nampho on Tuesday.
					 In the contest among boys and girls of secondary schools, those of Tongha Secondary School in Sinuiju City and Sinhung Secondary School in Sinhung County placed first in the boys' and girls' football events, Pyongyang Ryonghung Secondary School and Hwayang Secondary School in Paechon County in boys' and girls' indoor football events, Pyongyang Kwangmyong and Pyongyang Kwanmun secondary schools in boys' and girls' volleyball events and Sonbong Secondary School in Rason City in boys' and girls' badminton events.
					
					 In the contest of primary schoolers, Pyongyang Chungsong Primary School and Hoesang Primary School in Hoesang District of Hamhung City came first in the boys' and girls' football events and Kyongam and Sinhung primary schools in Sariwon City in boys' and girls' indoor football events.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for the Pochonbo Torch Prize that opened on June 3 came to a close.
					 The Rimyongsu Sports Team and the Chobyong Sports Team emerged winners in men's and women's soccer events and the men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team in basketball, table-tennis and boxing games.
					
					 Players of the Kigwancha Sports Team placed first in the rhythmic gymnastics while men players of the Sports Team of the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport and women players of the Piryugang Sports Team came first in the rowing events respectively.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place in Wonsan on Tuesday.

articles.title: Korean People Vow Vengeance on U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
Korean People Vow Vengeance on U.S. Imperialists
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are hardening their mind to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy, a thousandfold on the occasion of the "June 25, the day of the struggle against U.S. imperialism."
					 This year lots of servicepersons, working people, school youth and children have visited the Central House of Class Education, a place for indicting the crimes of the U.S. imperialists and a center for class education.
					
					 Listening to the explanation of the brutal atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists while invading Korea century after century since the intrusion of the aggression ship "General Sherman", the visitors firmly vowed to take revenge on the enemies without fail.
					
					 At the Sinchon Museum where more than 4,000 pieces of data, remains and lethal weapons are on display, the visitors keenly realized once again that the U.S. imperialists are the only horde of brutes in the world.
					
					 Looking round the place where the ghouls machine-gunned and threw hand-grenades at people and burnt their bodies to ashes right before their fleeing, the torture room, the slaughter-site and others at the House of Class Education in Susan-ri, Kangso County, the visitors expressed their resolution to wipe out to the last one the pernicious murderers, wolves in human shape, if they pounce upon the Korean people again.
					
					 Kim Kyong Son, student of Kim Il Sung University, stated that the young people are keeping in mind the heroism displayed by the former generations during the past Korean war in which they mercilessly punished with arms of justice the U.S. imperialists who started the war, being proud of their "mightiness".
					
					 Jon Myong Dok, worker of the Taedonggang Battery Factory, said the working class of the DPRK will fully display the mettle of heroic Korea in the confrontation with the U.S., bearing deep in mind the truth of the history that it will emerge victorious when it fights against imperialism to the last and, if not, it should be subjected to disgrace and humiliation.
					
					 Meanwhile, working people of all strata, youth and students held meetings to denounce and take vengeance on the enemy and gatherings with witnesses. At the events they stated that they, with the right of avenger, the right of defender, would certainly settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists and root out the cause of war on the globe if the latter starts a war again.

articles.title: Battle of Jiansanfeng
articles.content:
Battle of Jiansanfeng
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- More than seventy years have passed since the battle of Jiansanfeng in which the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) shattered to the smithereens the myth of the Japanese imperialist aggressor army, which boasted of being "invincible imperial army" during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 President Kim Il Sung guided the work with organizations of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland and people in an area near Pochonbo that the guerrilla army stormed in June Juche 26 (1937). Then he received reports that a large number of the Japanese imperialist aggressor troops were rushing to the area by scores of trucks.
					
					 He ordered to prepare for a battle immediately.
					
					 Firmly determined to fight a frontal battle against the large force of the enemy with a large unit of the KPRA, the President told commanding officers prior to the battle that they should not be dragged into the enemy's tactics of regular army but apply the guerrilla tactics initiatively.
					
					 After grasping the topographical conditions in detail to annihilate the enemy, he decided Jiansanfeng as the battle-site and worked out the battle plan with commanding officers and discussed with composure the direction of work and duty of the revolutionary organizations with political underground activists.
					
					 When the battle of Jiansanfeng started, he ordered to drive the enemy soldiers into ravine and to wipe out them.
					
					 Thanks to the flexible tactics of the President, the enemy which loudly talked about annihilating the revolutionary army sustained an ignominious defeat, leaving a colossal toll at the day-long battle. 
					
					 There were so many casualties that heads were cut off from the dead bodies, packed in sacks and wooden boxes and carried on carts to the place where lorries were waiting. 
					
					 The battle produced the famous anecdote on "pumpkin head".
					
					 The historic battle of Jiansanfeng was concluded with the miserable defeat of the enemy by the smart military stratagem of the President.

articles.title: New Landscape of Countryside
articles.content:
New Landscape of Countryside
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The fields of the DPRK get conspicuous these days. 
					 Wheat, barley and potato plants are swaying in the wind in fields and the paddy fields turn green with the transplantation of rice-seedlings.
					
					 Meanwhile, the potato fields are being converted into soy-bean ones.
					
					 Farmers are engaged in reaping the first crops--potato, wheat and barley-- and planting after-crops in fields. 
					
					 The new scenery showing spring and autumn proves the correctness of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of double cropping.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il put forward the policy of doing double-crop farming in a big way and clearly indicated the orientation and way for its implementation, saying that one of the important reserves for increased grain production in the DPRK where the arable land is limited is to do double-and triple-crop farming a year.
					
					 The two-crop system has been introduced on all the farms throughout the country.
					
					 The double-and triple-crop farming is being done on the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County, the Township Co-op Farm in Janggang County and other farms in east coastal areas and in the northern mountainous areas, to say nothing of the plain areas of west coastal areas which were rezoned as land befitting socialist Korea in the Songun era.

articles.title: Story on Chol Pass
articles.content:
Story on Chol Pass
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il called an official in August Juche 69 (1980) when the 100-day campaign was in full swing.
					He said that he used to recollect the fighting spirit and will displayed by the drivers of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War whenever difficult tasks were raised, stressing that the officials could hit the high eminence of the 100-day campaign if they strove with their fighting spirit and will.
					
					He told graphically a story of the transport soldiers of the People's Army who carried shells to the front over the steep Chol Pass in the teeth of shower of bullets and shells only with the resolution to discharge the combat duty without condition through the rain of bombs and machine-gun bullets of the enemy aircraft and thus ensured the victory in the battle.
					
					The official engraved in the heart why he told about the transport soldiers.
					
					After a while, the leader added that no matter how difficult to hit the eminence of the 100-day campaign was, it was inferior to driving lorries over the Chol Pass through the shower of enemy's bullets and there was no height people could not scale if they had such strong will and faith in sure victory.
					
					After then, officials stood in the van of the work with the strong spirit for defending the fatherland, the indomitable faith and fighting spirit of the transport soldiers, conveying the meaningful story to working people on the working sites.
					
					Kim Jong Il's story on Chol Pass was a motive power to raise higher the flame of the 100-day campaign.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Reckless Remarks of Lee Myung Bak Agitating Fratricidal War
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Reckless Remarks of Lee Myung Bak Agitating Fratricidal War
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea on June 25 arranged "a party commemorating the anniversary of the June 25 war" at which he let loose a spate of outbursts that "the south Korea-U.S. future vision reflected the firm faith to unify the country under liberal democracy" and that "he would act in concert with the U.S. despite any threat".
					 What Lee uttered represents his intention to unify the systems by military means at any cost, backed by the U.S. This is a vicious provocation to the DPRK and an open agitation of a war of aggression against the north and a fratricidal war.
					
					 It has already been made clear that the "policy of co-existence and co-prosperity towards the north" touted by the south Korean authorities is the theory of a fierce fratricidal war to decide who will prevail. But never before has he disclosed it so fully as this time, talking about "faith" and "action".
					
					 The theory of unifying the systems by strength and the theory of a fratricidal war amount to a total negation of all the agreements between the north and the south of Korea including the July 4 joint statement in which it clarified the three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- and its embodiment the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The traitor was reported to have claimed he never negates the existing agreements between the north and the south but intends to implement them. But the recent reckless remarks made by him saliently revealed before the world that it was nothing but a sheer lie and deception. 
					
					 Lee and his ilk have dreamt of launching a fratricidal war and an operation to stifle fellow countrymen under the signboard of "co-existence and co-prosperity".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the Lee group has become more reckless in its provocative remarks against the DPRK since Lee's U.S. junket.
					
					 On June 22, Lee went the lengths of asserting that the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is to "deter" and "prevent" a war and "he was of the view that north Korea would open itself to others and join the international community one day."
					
					 The puppet military disclosed even a scenario for preemptive attack on the DPRK in its "basic plan for national defence reforms" made public on June 26.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that his American master gave so strong shot in the arm of Lee in the Rose Garden of the White House that he and his group are seized with extreme zeal to stifle the DPRK and war fever.
					
					 The U.S. "nuclear umbrella" is by no means all-powerful. The Lee group is seriously mistaken if it dreams of "unifying Korea under the liberal democratic system," counting on it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will certainly mete out a stern punishment to the group of traitors in the name of the Korean nation for the thrice-cursed crimes it has committed by pursuing confrontation with the DPRK and sycophancy towards the U.S.
					
					 The ceaseless visits paid by the group to different countries to beg for protection would only bring to light its miserable plight as fear-stricken stooges and add to its crimes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Charades for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Ridiculed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Charades for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Ridiculed
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group invited former mercenaries of the United States and its satellite countries who participated in the past Korean war and their families to visit south Korea to stage such anti-DPRK farces as "tours," "commemoration event" and "party" on the occasion of the anniversary of the June 25 war. Moreover, it also staged the biggest-ever "exercises for implementing the operation plan reminiscent of the June 25 war" under the simulated conditions of an actual war to invade the DPRK throughout Kangwon Province of south Korea.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					These moves are aimed at covering up its despicable true nature as provocateur of the Korean war and justifying the "sanctions" now in force against the DPRK and its moves to provoke a war against the DPRK.
					
					The Lee group has worked hard to falsify truth and the real facts about how the Korean war was provoked, prompted by its criminal intention to follow in the footsteps of the U.S. imperialists and traitor Syngman Rhee that plunged the Koreans into the scourge of war. This is clearly exemplified by the following facts: The south Korean authorities fully participated in the PSI, a U.S.-led mechanism for a war of aggression against the DPRK, taking issue with its measures for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, they let loose bellicose outbursts that they would not "rule out even armed clashes" while amassing armed forces in the waters along the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea and they are getting frantic in their dangerous "sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					
					The reckless acts of the Lee group remind one of the reckless military provocations perpetrated by puppet traitor Syngman Rhee on the eve of the war of northward aggression in the 1950s. 
					
					With neither plot nor artifice can the south Korean puppets cover up the truth about the war of aggression they started against the DPRK in league with the U. S. imperialists nor can they justify the evermore undisguised moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					Should the Lee group finally ignite a war against the DPRK with the U.S. imperialists, oblivious of the historic lesson of the June 25 war, it will perish in the flames kindled by itself, warns the commentary.

articles.title: U.S. Promise to Provide "Nuclear Umbrella" to S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Promise to Provide "Nuclear Umbrella" to S. Korea Blasted
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. chief executive invited puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea to visit Washington in mid-June and promised him to provide "extended deterrence" including "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea and made it public in an official document.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary says that this is, in essence, nothing but an open declaration before the world that the U.S. would not rule out even a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the U.S. recently talked about someone's "nuclear attack" on south Korea but this is no more than rhetoric to justify its scenario for a nuclear war.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the U.S. and south Korea declared that they would openly put into practice their scenario for a nuclear attack on the DPRK which has been secretly pushed forward in the backroom for years, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 There are already signs of this development. 
					
					 There are reports that the nuclear-powered carrier George Washington has appeared in the waters close to the Korean Peninsula and the U.S. 7th fleet combat group led by the nuclear-powered carrier Ronald Reagan left its mainland and headed for Northeast Asia.
					
					 This compels the DPRK to openly stand in the nuclear confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The escalated military moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK with preemptive nuclear attacks would only prompt the latter to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence to protect its sovereignty and security.
					
					 This is the only way of preventing the outbreak of a war and defending the territory of the country and the lives and security of the Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. will be held fully accountable for all the consequences to be entailed by the nuclear stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S.

articles.title: Suppression of Reunification Movement Flayed
articles.content:
Suppression of Reunification Movement Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on June 26 denouncing the puppet Intelligence Service's crackdown upon the reunification movement. 
					 The statement referred to the fact that the IS recently summoned members of the Pusan Headquarters of the committee to appear, charging them with violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 As for the deed the IS asserted as "violation" of the SL, the said organization sponsored an event marking the 9th publication anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration in Pusan at which the congratulatory messages from the North Side Committee and the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration were read out, it said.
					
					  Recalling that similar messages from the north were read out at the previous reunification events, the statement expressed apprehension  over the behavior of the IS seeking to repress the pro-reunification exchange, being officially conducted through the South Side Committee, by invoking the SL.
					
					 It urged the IS to repeal the unreasonable summons at once. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on the same day condemning the security authorities' recent arrest of the chairman of the 8th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) and the former chairman of the Seoul District Federation of University Student Councils under Hanchongryon.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to release the arrested patriotic youths and all the prisoners of conscience, stop at once the anti-reunification moves and step down.

articles.title: Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step down Called for
articles.content:
Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step down Called for
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on June 26 calling for waging an indomitable struggle to force the dictatorial regime to step down. 
					 The statement accused the judicial authorities of committing such human rights abuses as blocking the correspondence of Yun Ki Jin, chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, now in prison and destroying his letters. 
					
					 The authorities have intensified the suppression of Yun, not content with passing a heavy penalty upon him on the charge of violation of the anachronistic "Security Law", though he only conducted activities for reunification, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The dictatorial regime is putting anyone desirous of national reunification and opposed to the regime into custody, the statement deplored, declaring that the democratic rights of the people can never be guaranteed nor can the south and the north advance toward the country's reunification hand in hand as long as the Lee Myung Bak regime is allowed to stay in power.

articles.title: Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Mounts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Mounts in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The movement for issuing declarations on the situation denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime of traitors is gaining in scope and strength in south Korea. 
					More than 4,420 unionists under the Federation of Trade Unions for Democracy issued a declaration on the situation on June 26 calling for stopping the moves to adopt "Lee Myung Bak evil laws".
					
					 The declaration said that what Lee has done while in office is not something to recover economy but to fatten the rich who account for just one percent of the population. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to immediately repeal the unpopular part-time policy of forcing workers to roam about streets and stop suppressing civic organizations under the pretext of security. 
					
					 It demanded the guarantee of the freedom of speech and assembly, a halt to the moves to adopt "Lee Myung Bak evil laws", the withdrawal of the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and the like. 
					
					1,037 stage players including drama producers, actors and actresses and play writers also issued a declaration on the situation that day condemning the Lee regime for enforcing an indiscriminate rule under the pretext of security and escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The declaration noted that men of literature and arts on this land would wage a vigorous struggle for the realization of democracy in solidarity with the people from all walks of life. 
					
					 More than 300 professors affiliated to the Federation of University Professors Engaged in the Missionary Work issued a declaration on the situation at Yeongnam University on June 27. 
					
					 The declaration called for terminating the history of contradiction and division without fail and not letting the tragedy of the June 25 war repeat itself. 
					
					 The Lee "government" should solve the serious problem of unemployment, weather the worsening economic crisis and guarantee the freedom of religious activities, it urged.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Misrule Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Misrule Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- People from different walks of life in south Korea launched the struggle against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' unpopular policy in Seoul on June 27.
					 A rally was held in the plaza of the city office by the All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Project of Destroying Four Large Rivers and Protecting Them for Life, which consists of over 450 civic and public organizations, four religious orders and opposition parties.
					
					 The participants in the rally charged that the project for "adjusting four large rivers," being enforced by the Lee Myung Bak "government," is a replica of the "grand canal project" rejected by the population as it is for destroying natural environment and battening big businesses.
					
					 It is also a reckless undertaking of destroying the four large rivers with the investment of tremendous taxes paid by the people, they pointed out, urging the Lee "government" to rescind the unpopular project at once.
					
					 Prior to the rally, lawmakers from opposition parties staged a sit-in strike in the plaza, protesting against the police's decision to "disallow" the rally.
					
					Meanwhile, more than 6,000 members of the Public Service Trade Union under the KCTU (the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions) held a rally in Youido to declare a general strike for defending their vital rights.
					
					 On the same day, a memorial service took place on the spot of the Ryongsan tragic case under the sponsorship of the All-People Measure Committee against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan.

articles.title: Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
articles.content:
Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets desperately perpetrated aerial espionage against the DPRK in June by mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.
					 On June 28 the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' overseas-based E-3 and RC-135 made shuttle flights in the air above the waters east of Orang, Musudan and Riwon on the East Coast and on June 10 and 12 they made similar flights in the air above the waters east of Musudan, Hamhung and Thongchon to perpetrate aerial surveillance and photographing and electronic reconnaissance against all areas of the DPRK.
					
					 On June 25 Japan-based E-3 flew in the air above the area of south Korea to command flying corps of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the puppet air force and to spy on areas of the DPRK.  On June 10 EP-3 made a long flight to commit electronic reconnaissance against coastal and front areas of the DPRK.
					
					 On June 29 south Korea-based U-2 made shuttle flights from the east to the west all day long to spy on the DPRK. The number of cases of aerial espionage perpetrated by this plane reached 27 this month and more than 140 in the first half of this year.
					
					 On June 24 and 25 the U.S. imperialists let 15 reconnaissance planes of different types including U-2, RC-12, RC-7B, and E-3 fly in the air above areas along the front and coastal areas to spy on the DPRK.
					
					 The number of cases of aerial espionage perpetrated by RC-12 and RC-7B of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces against the DPRK reached more than 80 this month and at least 450 this year. 
					
					 Keeping pace with these spy missions, the warmongers of the south Korean puppet forces let two or three RC-800 and RF-4C make shuttle flights day and night every day from the air over the areas along the front on the West Coast to the air over the areas along the front on the East Coast to intensify the espionage against the areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces committed more than 110 cases while the south Korean puppet army at least 90 cases in June, bringing the total number of cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK to more than 1,100 cases in the first six months of the year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The director of the International Relations of the People's Democratic Party of Uzbekistan made public a statement on June 16 to commemorate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement praised the last 45 years of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's leadership over the WPK as the history of wise guidance and great devotion in which he has led to victory the Korean people's struggle for building socialism and achieving national reunification while weathering the stern trials and difficulties and dedicated his all to the country and the people.
					
					 As they have had Kim Jong Il at the top post of the party, the state and the army, the Korean people could advance holding high the banner of socialism despite the collapse of socialist countries in Eastern Europe, the consecutive severe natural disasters and the imperialists' persistent blockade and scheme to stifle the DPRK and are now making big strides towards the rosy future of a great prosperous and powerful nation, it said.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Korean people would surely win a shining victory in the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification in the near future, remaining true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Austria and Nigeria issued bulletins on June 19 to commemorate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna carried in its bulletin a portrait of Kim Jong Il and an article praising his feats.
					
					 The article noted that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the welfare of the people, authored many celebrated works through his distinguished ideo-theoretical activities and wisely led the party, the state and the army.
					
					 The bulletin contained detailed contents of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and dealt with the facts that President Kim Il Sung advanced the fair and reasonable proposals for national reunification and dedicated all his life to the cause of reunification and Kim Jong Il has successfully implemented the President's behests for national reunification.
					
					 It also noted that the south Korean people are holding in high esteem Kim Jong Il as the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea carried in its bulletin an article titled "Single-minded unity of the DPRK and Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il set forth the revolutionary philosophy of single-minded unity and put the single-minded unity of the whole society on a high level and the Korean people have always emerged victorious in the revolution and construction by dint of this unity provided by him.

articles.title: DPRK Lauded as Invincible Country
articles.content:
DPRK Lauded as Invincible Country
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Personages of Mexico and Myanmar made public statements on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Alejandro Rosales Sanchez, chairman of the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said in the June 22 statement that it was an event of weighty significance in the Korean nation's reunification movement that the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, its action programme, were adopted thanks to the patriotic, courageous decision of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK who is the lodestar of reunification.
					
					 The statement pointed out that the U.S. still remains the main obstacle to Korea's reunification.
					
					 It condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea for following the policy of the U.S. which recently instigated the UNSC to adopt the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the cause of national reunification under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 A prominent figure of Myanmar said in the statement on June 17 that 59 years have passed since the U.S. ignited the Korean war, but the U.S. imperialists can never shirk the blame for the unethical crimes committed in Korea and the provocation of the war.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 The U.S. should be well aware that the DPRK is an invincible country with the powerful military deterrent and that no force on earth can break the single-minded unity of the Korean army and people closely rallied around their great brilliant commander, which is stronger than nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious and strikingly demonstrate its dignity as an invincible socialist power in the future, too, as there are the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary army and people strong in mental power.

articles.title: Significant Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Significant Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting, a film show and an art performance took place in Peru, a reading session and a lecture in Mali and film shows in Russia and Ukraine between June 17 and 19 to commemorate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th publication anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said at the meeting that all spectacular achievements made by the Korean people are attributable to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung while working long at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea said it is an epoch-making event in the movement for Korea's reunification that the inter-Korean summit was provided for the first time after the national division and the June 15 joint declaration adopted thanks to Kim Jong Il. We fully support the Korean people in the struggle to achieve national reunification under the banner of the joint declaration, he added.
					
					 The principal of a school in Mali said that 45 years of Kim Jong Il's leadership over the WPK are the immortal history during which he performed enormous feats for the Korean people and progressive humankind with his extraordinary political caliber. He is a prominent elder statesman as he formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode of socialism, the speaker stressed.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as "The Korean People's Army, Steel-like Ranks" and "Mt. Kuwol, Scenic Spot on West Coast".

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Opens in Peru
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Opens in Peru
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Peru on June 18 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung, the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 On display at the exhibition hall were works of the peerlessly great men, photos showing their Songun revolutionary leadership feats, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicraft works associated with the Korean people's wisdom and talents. 
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were personages of the Revolutionary Socialist Party and the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, San Marcos National University in Lima, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and popular masses of Peru.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Lima.
					
					 Federico Garcia, director of the Cultural Center of San Marcos National University in Lima, said at the opening ceremony that the progressive mankind has expressed admiration for the DPRK's satellite launch, well aware of the fact that this launch was for peaceful purposes, not for military aims.
					
					 He said that the Peruvian people will get, through the exhibits on display, deeper understanding of the stamina and creative ability of the Korean people with a history of the nation spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 The exhibition will last till July 18.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el servilismo a EE.UU. de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el servilismo a EE.UU. de Lee Myung Bak
  Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea dijo el dia 25 en el llamado "banquete con motivo de la guerra desatada el 25 de junio (de 1950)" que "ha reflejado en la vision al futuro Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos su firme fe en la reunificacion mediante la democracia liberal" y que "actuaria con EE.UU. bajo cualquier amenaza".
					  Este disparate significa la determinacion de realizar sin falta por via militar la reunificacion de los diferentes regimenes con el abrigo de EE.UU., siendo intolerable provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y abierta instigacion a la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, o sea, la fratricida entre los coreanos.
					
					  Ya quedo revelado que la "politica sobre el Norte" adornada con las palabras "convivencia y coprosperidad", de que hablan tanto las autoridades surcoreanas, es la doctrina de la encarnizada pelea de los compatriotas para eliminarse entre si.
					
					  Pero, nunca hubo casos de que el mismo traidor Lee expusiera ese intento tan abiertamente como esta vez hablando de la "fe" y "actuar".
					
					  Las teorias de la reunificacion de los regimenes con el uso de la fuerza y de la guerra fratricida constituyen desafio frontal a todos los acuerdos intercoreanos como la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, que aclara los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, y la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, que son productos de la primera.
					
					  El nuevo chisme de Lee sirve de prueba contundente para verificar cuan mentirosas y enganosas son sus palabras de que no se niega a los acuerdos existentes entre el Norte y el Sur y tiene la voluntad de ejecutarlos.
					
					  Los compinches de Lee sonaban con la guerra fratricida y el aplastamiento a los compatriotas detras del vistoso cartel de "convivencia y coprosperidad".
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que sus discursos anti-RPDC se tornaron mas agresivos e imprudentes despues de la visita de Lee a EE.UU.
					
					  El pasado dia 22, Lee hablo de que la presencia de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea es para "disuadir" y "prevenir" la guerra y que "cree que el Norte de Corea se unira algun dia a la sociedad internacional abriendo sus puertas".
					
					  Mientras tanto, el circulo militar titere surcoreano dio a conocer el guion de golpe preventivo contra el Norte de Corea a traves del "plan principal de la reforma de defensa nacional" publicado el dia 26.
					
					  La realidad demuestra que el encuentro en la Casa Blanca entre el traidor Lee y su amo gringo inculco en la pandilla del primero el fanatismo por atropellar a la RPDC mediante la guerra.
					
					  Pero, no es un medio omnipotente el "paraguas nuclear" de EE.UU. 
					
					Estaria muy equivocada la pandilla de Lee si suena con la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" confiando en esa proteccion nuclear.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC castigaran duro sin falta, en nombre de toda la nacion, a la banda del traidor Lee que cometio crimenes inexpiables recurriendo a la confrontacion con la RPDC y al servilismo a EE.UU.
					
					  Si la camarilla de Lee sigue deambulando en busca de la proteccion, mostrara mas su miserable condicion de lacayo acobardado y abultara su expediente criminal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras belicas de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras belicas de banda de Lee Myung Bak
  Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este martes un comentario individual que va como sigue:
					En ocasion del 25 de junio (dia del estallido de la pasada guerra coreana), la banda de Lee Myung Bak celebro diversas actividades provocativas a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como la "visita", el "acto conmemorativo" y el "banquete de consuelo" para los ex mercenarios de Estados Unidos y de otros paises satelites, quienes habian participado en dicha guerra, y sus familiares invitados al Sur de Corea.
					
					  Por otra parte, realizo a lo largo de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea el "ejercicio para la ejecucion del plan operacional en memoria del 25 de Junio" de maxima envergadura suponiendo la agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Esto parte del intento de justificar sus maniobras para "sancionar" y provocar la guerra contra la RPDC y disimular los aspectos de la provocacion de la pasada guerra coreana distorsionando la verdad.
					
					De esta manera, esa camarilla pretende repetir la historia criminal de EE.UU. y el traidor Syngman Rhee que impusieron a la nacion coreana los desastres de guerra.
					
					  Corrobora estas pretensiones el hecho de que las autoridades surcoreanas participaron totalmente en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion", aparato inventado por EE.UU. para la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, cuestionando las medidas autodefensivas de ella para fortalecer su disuasivo nuclear, y pronuncian discursos agresivos como "no reparar en el conflicto armado" concentrando colosales fuerzas armadas en las aguas perifericas a la linea de demarcacion militar en el Mar Oeste de Corea.  
					
					  Ademas, ellas intensifican mas que nunca su aventurera campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC.
					
					  Estos sospechosos movimientos son identicos a las imprudentes acciones que hacia el traidor Syngman Rhee en la decada de 1950 cuando estaba a punto de provocar la guerra contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos no podran encubrir de ninguna manera su crimen de haber provocado la guerra contra la RPDC en contubernio con los imperialistas norteamericanos ni justificar sus maniobras conflictivas y belicistas contra la segunda que se recrudecen cada dia mas.
					
					  Si la banda de Lee desencadena al fin y al cabo junto con EE.UU. la guerra contra la RPDC olvidando las lecciones historicas del 25 de Junio, morira envuelta en la llama encendida por si misma.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano jura vengarse de los imperialistas yanquis
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano jura vengarse de los imperialistas yanquis
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del "Dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de Junio", el pueblo coreano redobla la determinacion de vengarse, cueste lo que cueste, de los imperialistas agresores norteamericanos, enemigos jurados de la nacion coreana.
					  Solo este ano, numerosos militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares visitaron el Pabellon Central de Educacion Clasista, donde se delatan los crimenes de los yanquis.
					
					  En este lugar los visitantes se informan de las bestialidades cometidas por aquellos en la agresion a Corea que prosigue de siglo en siglo desde la intrusion del barco invasor "Sherman".
					
					Por otra parte, los visitantes al Museo de Sinchon, donde estan expuestos mas de 4 mil datos, objetos y armas blancas letales, vuelven a sentirse en carne propia que esos bestias disfrazados de hombre (imperialistas yanquis) es la peor horda de este mundo.
					
					En el Pabellon de Educacion Clasista de la comuna de Susan del distrito de Kangso se conservan los sitios donde los matones norteamericanos torturaron y quemaron a los moradores asesinados a metrallas y granadazos antes de retirarse de esa localidad.
					
					El estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Kyong Son, dijo que los miembros de la nueva generacion heredaron integramente el espiritu heroico de las anteriores generaciones que castigaron despiadadamente con las justicieras fuerzas armadas a los imperialistas yanquis que invadieron a Corea confiados de su "supremacia" en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					
					Jon Myong Dok, obrero de la Fabrica de Baterias Taedonggang, senalo que la clase obrera de Corea manifestara sin reservas el temperamento de la Corea heroica en la confrontacion con Estados Unidos teniendo presente la verdad de la historia de que habra la victoria si lucha hasta el final contra el imperialismo y sufrira la afrenta y la verguenza si se rinde.
					
					Por otra parte, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares realizan el mitin de repudio, el acto de jurar la venganza, el encuentro con los que experimentaron el salvajismo de los yanquis.
					
					En las ocasiones ellos manifiestan su decision de acabar con los imperialistas yanquis ejerciendo el derecho de vengador y defensor si estos se atreven a desatar la nueva guerra y eliminar asi la causa de guerra en el globo terraqueo.

articles.title: Victoria aplastante del ERPC en el combate de Jiansanfeng
articles.content:
Victoria aplastante del ERPC en el combate de Jiansanfeng
						
  Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- Transcurrieron mas de 70 anos desde el combate de Jiansanfeng.
					En ese combate historico que tuvo lugar durante la lucha armada antijaponesa se estrello ante el poderio del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea (ERPC) el mito de la "invencibilidad" de las tropas agresoras japonesas.
					
					  Despues de asaltar a Pochombo en junio del 26 (1937) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung dirigio en un lugar cercano a esa localidad las labores de las celulas de la Asociacion para la Restauracion de la Patria y el trabajo con el pueblo.
					
					Entonces, recibio el parte de que se acercaban un gran numero de los uniformados japoneses a bordo de decenas de camiones y ordeno enseguida a los guerrilleros entrar en la disposicion de combate.
					
					  Decidido a librar la batalla de frente a frente contra ese gran destacamento del enemigo, antes de entrar en ella, el Presidente instruyo a los comandantes que aplicaran con iniciativa los metodos guerrilleros sin arrastrarse en los regulares a que esta habituado el enemigo.
					
					A base del analisis detallado de la topografia local, el Presidente fijo Jiansanfeng como escenario de combate.
					
					Despues de trazar la operacion con los comandantes, debatio con pasmosa tranquilidad con los activistas politicos el rumbo de trabajo y el deber de las organizaciones revolucionarias.
					
					  Una vez iniciado el combate, el Presidente ordeno a los guerrilleros eliminar a las tropas japonesas acorralandolas en la encanada.
					
					  Por las diestras tacticas del Presidente, los enemigos japoneses, que juraban pomposamente exterminar al ERPC, sufrieron una gran derrota con el saldo de incontables bajas en ese combate que duro todo el dia.
					
					  Impotentes de transportar todos esos cadaveres, los japoneses decidieron degollarlos y llevarse solo las cabezas en sacos o cajas de madera.
					
					  Cuando los curiosos les preguntaban que cosa llevaban en esos sacos, les mentian que era calabaza.
					
					  Asi se creo la famosa anecdota de la "cabeza de calabaza".
